response.original_title: カウボーイビバップ 天国の扉
response.overview: The year is 2071. Following a terrorist bombing, a deadly virus is released on the populace of Mars and the government has issued the largest bounty in history, for the capture of whoever is behind it. The bounty hunter crew of the spaceship Bebop; Spike, Faye, Jet and Ed, take the case with hopes of cashing in the bounty. However, the mystery surrounding the man responsible, Vincent, goes deeper than they ever imagined, and they aren't the only ones hunting him.
response.tagline: They're here to save the planet. But not for free.
response.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie

titles.title: Cowboy Bebop: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
Cowboy Bebop: Pukając do nieba bram

cast.name: Aoi Tada
cast.character: Edward Wong Hau Pepelu Tivruski IV (voice)

release_dates.note: American Cinematheque's Festival of Fantasy, Horror and Science Fiction
